Definition.WordDefinition: rub down v 1: wear away [syn: {abrade}, {corrade}, {abrase}, {rub off}] 2: manually manipulate (someone's body), usually for medicinal or relaxation purposes; "She rubbed down her child with a sponge" [syn: {massage}, {knead}]
rubdown n : the act of rubbing down, usually for relaxation or medicinal purposes
